metadata.title: CVE-2020-6071 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the resource record-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsing compressed labels in mDNS messages, the compression pointer is followed without checking for recursion, leading to a denial of service. An attacker can send an mDNS message to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
